summary: Implements a matrix-oriented Gated Recurrent Unit (GRU) gate that performs the gating calculations on matrix-valued inputs, handling the linear transformations, reset and update mechanisms, and producing the gated output according to the formulation in the referenced paper.
business_intent: Provides a reusable neural component for models that need recurrent processing of structured matrix data, such as graph representations or spatial feature maps, enabling efficient gated updates within deep learning pipelines.
